farming().notice: used to get the farming contract address

resetAllowance(uint256).notice: used to resetAllowance with farming contract to take rewards

userdoc.notice: RewardManagerWithdrawable handles the creation of the contract farming The RewardManager is the owner of the funds in the FarmingRange, only the RewardManager is capable of sending funds to be farmed and only the RewardManager will get the funds back when updating of removing campaigns. The specificity of the withdrawable reward manager is that it's used for promoted campaigns, and thus the needs to be able to withdraw funds is here.
